trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger fixes you with his gaze.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_TODO_00<tab>Use the Sharlayan box to capture a weakened hawker.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the boxed hawker to Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Sul Uin.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>All is well with us...for the time being. There's no telling what manner of games the pixies will dream up.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Have you met Urianger yet? The sooner you do, the sooner we can leave this place.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_THANCRED_000_010<tab>We will be much bolstered for Urianger's company.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_RYNE_000_015<tab>Oh...er, no need to worry about me. I'm quite familiar with the manor.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_RYNE_000_016<tab>During our wanderings, Thancred and I would often return here. It's where I imbue his ammunition.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_020<tab>My friend. Ere I speak of the task at hand, there is a question I would pose to thee.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_021<tab>What thinkest thou...of mine appearance?
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_A1_000_001<tab>Did you take up astrology?
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_A1_000_002<tab>Did you lose weight?
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_A1_000_003<tab>I didn't recognize you at first.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_022<tab>Indeed. Though the night be lost, behind the shroud of blinding light, doubt not but that the stars shine still.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_023<tab>I have chosen to avail myself of their guidance, that I might navigate the sea of uncertainty that stretcheth before us. For a blessing, my prior studies of astrology did provide me with adequate grounding in the art.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_024<tab>Did I...lose weight? If 'tis of flesh thou speakest, I cannot rightly say. However, in taking up astrology, I may have shed with some yalms of fabric. My present attire better suiteth the art.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_025<tab>Though the night be lost, behind the shroud of blinding light, doubt not but that the stars shine still. I have chosen to avail myself of their guidance, that I might navigate the sea of uncertainty that stretcheth before us.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_026<tab>Come now, 'tis scarce the first time thou hast beheld these fair features. Lest thou wonderest, I have taken up astrology. My present attire better suiteth the art.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_027<tab>Though the night be lost, behind the shroud of blinding light, doubt not but that the stars shine still. I have chosen to avail myself of their guidance, that I might navigate the sea of uncertainty that stretcheth before us.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_028<tab>But enough of myself. Let us now speak of our task.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_029<tab>As I did mention, if we are to enter Lyhe Ghiah, we must needs gain the pixies' cooperation.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_030<tab>This is a simple matter of presenting unto them a suitable gift.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_031<tab>I shall procure a selection of viands that shall please their palates. Thancred, pray assist me in this endeavor.

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_032<tab>Meanwhile, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I bid thee obtain that which will please their eyes. In these parts, there abideth a vilekin known for its beauteous wings: the hawker. I shall lend thee a receptacle within which thou mayest capture a weakened specimen.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_THANCRED_000_040<tab>There's no avoiding chores, is there? Far better under Urianger than the pixies, of course.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_045<tab>Thou shouldst find a hawker nearby. Pray use the receptacle I have lent thee to capture a weakened specimen.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_050<tab>Thou art returned. Wert thou able to capture a hawker?
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_051<tab>Ah, a truly magnificent set of wings. I shall treat them at once to make fast their vibrant colors.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_052<tab>Thancred too should return anon, upon which I shall ready all the items for presentation. Pray take thine ease meanwhile.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>You couldn't have returned at a better time. The pixies had just decided that it would be amusing to have Alisaie and I exchange outfits...
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Ahaha, thank the gods you arrived when you did! Any later, and I don't think I would've been able to live it down!
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_THANCRED_000_070<tab>When you have a moment, be sure to show your appreciation to the twins. They've endured a great deal on our behalf...
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_RYNE_000_075<tab>I dare not ask what happened in our absence...

TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_URIANGER_000_080<tab>As much as I should like to savor the reunion with Master Alphinaud and Mistress Alisaie, it must wait. I have taken the liberty of presenting our gifts unto the pixies; let us see how well they are received.
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_SULUIN_000_090<tab>We weren't expecting you all back so soon. We had scarcely begun playing with the twins...
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_SULUIN_000_091<tab>That said, your gifts are truly wonderful! Let me tell you, the milk and honey and biscuits won't last a day, and the wings are the loveliest we've ever seen!
TEXT_LUCKMB110_03311_SULUIN_000_092<tab>You've done us a great kindness, and it's fae custom to return the gesture. If you desire anything of us, you need but name it!
